title: Verify the admin user can disable the spring venue
custom_expected:
Then
verify the response contains venue_enabled object with the same value as in the request input

title: Verify the admin user can post the spring venue config in Beta
custom_preconds:
Given
Successful submission of venue enable in put https://ticketing-admin.mlb.com/api/config/v1/boxo_config/121-3289
custom_expected:
Then
Response should contain the venue-enabled
And
Submit GET 'https://ticketing-admin.mlb.com/api/config/v1/boxo_config/121-3289 should show the updated venue-enabled
And
venue-enabled should also show https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ticketing-prod/app-configs/boxoffice/beta/121-3289.json

title: Verify the admin user can post the spring venue config in Prod
custom_expected:
Then

title: E2E_BoxOffice still able to pull regular venue tickets when spring venue is disable
custom_preconds:
Given
 venue-enabled shows the spring venue id set to false
custom_expected:
Then
Verify the ticket details for regular venue tickets displaying without any issues
And
BoxOffice log shows. Ex ![](index.php?/attachments/get/10644725)

And
Regular venue shows in account search
![](index.php?/attachments/get/10644726)

title: E2E_BoxOffice is will make the spring venue calls when spring venue is enable
custom_preconds:
Given
 venue-enabled shows the spring venue id set to true
custom_expected:
Then
Verify the ticket details for regular venue tickets displaying without any issues
And
BoxOffice log shows.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/10654212)


And
Regular venue shows in account search
And
Spring venue shows in account search
